top10_tweets_like:
This is your periodic reminder of free #rstats learning content that we‚Äôve produced largely in response to the DataCamp incident. 

I want my students to feel valued and safe. 

First off: The R-Bootcamp. No install required, just browser: https://t.co/Ao1MeyqErv
sometimes you just need the comforting warm embrace of rstudio #rstats https://t.co/8bygY4vAYI

For those that are new to the DataCamp controversy:  I have been following it from the beginning, and I'm here to share a bit so you know why this is big news and why the #rstats community is so fired up:

I've compiled some of my favorite resources for learning #rstats (for free!) and highlighted reasons why each may be a good fit for your needs!

https://t.co/8lX3NMP90D

(üôèthank you for inspiration @jessicalavs,  @djnavarro, @kbodwin, @Jonthegeek, @tylermorganwall, & @rctatman)

In addition to '+' I'm contemplating a new '|' operator for #rstats #rspatial üì¶ {mapview} to allow for a slider between two maps as in the example below (taken from ?leaflet.extras2::addSideBySide):

mapview(franconia) | mapview(breweries)

Would this be of interest/useful? https://t.co/10ozt7eLwv

In case you coincidentally happen to be looking for alternative ways to learn #rstats and tidyverse because your current learning platform is busy ... *checks notes * ... suing your interactive development environment, may I suggest this series of 73 YouTube lecture videos: https://t.co/j0Xsv77b5q
It says a lot about the #rstats community that, despite yet more badness involving DataCamp (*massive eyeroll*), they continue to generate and share free resources for learning R:

Can we please stop doing this! üíî
Imagine coming from a non-CS background, worked hard learning #rstats the whole semester, today you actually feel pretty good because you managed to put together a legit ‚ú®dashboard‚ú®, and then you find this on LinkedIn. üòû https://t.co/8wqshvLSdL

Hi fam! If you want learn some #sem #rstats #lavaan for free(!) I have my entire course on YouTube. Even better, the great @Savvylewis15 has helped me reorganize my YouTube excel sheet so the website will include a watching order list again soon. 

https://t.co/ngqxXn81G2
Really enjoying diving into the guts of testthat ‚Äî it's been awhile minute since I seriously worked on it and I'm getting excited about all the features coming in testthat 3.0.0 üòÄ #rstats
